author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: It is not a lack of love . but a lact of friendship that makes unhappy marriages

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Without music , life would be a mistake.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
content: It is not a lack of love . but a lact of friendship that makes unhappy marriages

author: Albert Camus
content: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Sometimes people don't wanna hear the truth because they don't want their illusion destroyed.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
content: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning to sail my ship.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: I am too intellegent , too demanding, and too resouceful for anyone to be able to take charge of me entirely.No one knows me or loves me completely. I have only myself.

author: Plato
content: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Søren Kierkegaard
content: It is not the absence of dreams that defines a person, but the absence of the desire to make them come true.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: There are no facts , only interpretations

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: I am incapable to conceiving infinity, and yet i do not acept finity.I want this adventure that is the context of my life to go on without end.

author: Socrates
content: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Jean-Paul Satre
content: Do you think that I count the days? There is only one day left, always starting over: it is given to us at dawn and taken away from us at dusk.

author: Franz Kafka
content: The world is a stage, and all the players must perform at the right time.

author: Franz Kafka
content: One idiot is one idiot. Two idiots are two idiots. Ten thousand idiots are a political party.

author: Aristotle
content: We are what we do repeatedly. Excellence, then, is a habit, not an action.
